titles.title: To amend the National Dam Safety Program Act with respect to the definition of eligible high hazard potential dam, and for other purposes.
To amend the National Dam Safety Program Act with respect to the definition of eligible high hazard potential dam, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill makes licensed hydroelectric dams with authorized installed capacity of less than 1500 kilowatts eligible for a program that provides grants for the rehabilitation of high hazard potential dams.
